title: Who's Ready For Rugrats 2021? | First Look | Paramount+
author: Paramount Plus
description:
Tommy, Angelica, Chuckie and the rest of the Rugrats gang are back for an all-new, CG-animated series on Paramount+! Settle into your high chairs for this exciting first look at the show, which continues the tale of toddlers from the classic Nickelodeon '90s hit. Then, get ready to reunite with the iconic group of babies - voiced by members of the original cast - as they embark on a new batch of epic adventures!

Learn more about Paramount+: https://bit.ly/2ZPsCkO  

Follow Paramount+ for the latest news: 
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/ParamountPlus 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/paramountplus 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/paramountplus/

localize.description:
Tommy、Angelica、Chuckie和其他Rugrats帮的成员们又回来了，他们将在Paramount+上推出一个全新的CG动画系列。请坐进您的高脚椅，欣赏这部令人激动的首部剧集，它延续了Nickelodeon 90年代经典剧集的幼儿故事。然后，准备好与这群标志性的宝宝们重逢吧--由原班人马配音--他们将开始新一轮的史诗般的冒险!

了解更多关于Paramount+的信息：https://bit.ly/2ZPsCkO

localize.title: 谁为《Rugrats 2021》做好准备？| 第一眼看｜派拉蒙

localize.description:
Tommy、Angelica、Chuckie和其他Rugrats幫的成員們又回來了，他們將在Paramount+上推出一個全新的CG動畫系列。請坐進您的高腳椅，欣賞這部令人激動的首部劇集，它延續了Nickelodeon 90年代經典劇集的幼兒故事。然後，準備好與這羣標誌性的寶寶們重逢吧--由原班人馬配音--他們將開始新一輪的史詩般的冒險!
